mapper.select: select d_no, d_id, d_name, d_nae from sydept
select d_no, d_id, d_name, d_nae from sydept where d_no = #{d_no}
mapper.insert: insert into sydept(d_no, d_id, d_name, d_nae) values(SEQ_SYDEPT_NO.nextval,#{d_id}, #{d_name},#{d_nae})
mapper.update: update sydept set d_id = #{d_id}, d_name = #{d_name}, d_nae = #{d_nae} where d_no = #{d_no}
